item.title: In-Memory Cache (LRU / LFU) — Project
item.description:
title: “In-Memory Cache (LRU / LFU) — Project” description: “Build a thread-safe in-memory cache with bounded capacity and eviction policies (LRU/LFU). Learn DS + algorithms + concurrency through a real system component.” date: 2026-02-12 layout: “topic-content” tags: [“projects”, “core-systems”, “cache”, “lru”, “lfu”, “concurrency”, “java”] weight: 1

Overview

An in-memory cache stores frequently accessed data directly in memory to provide fast reads and reduce expensive operations like database calls or remote API requests.
